title: Sir John Everett Millais
creator_credit: Anita Sterner, Kenneth Gordon and BBC
brief_description: Made to celebrate the 150th anniversary of Millais’ birth. This program retraces his life and work through letters to and from his contemporaries and through a large collection of paintings and drawings. Provides a complement to “The Pre-Raphaelite revolt”. Narrated by Anne Massey.
